node.hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.detail_zh: 患者為 20 個月大女嬰，是曾參與愉景灣婚禮確診賓客的第 237 宗患者的女兒。患者在 3 月 20 日出現發燒症狀，在東區醫院留醫。
node.detail_en: The patient is a 20-month-old baby, and she is the daughter of patient no #237, who was a guest to Discovery Bay wedding.  She started having fever since Mar 20 and is in Pamela Youde Nethersole Eastern Hospital.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_en: Lan Kwai Fong/Discovery Bay wedding banquet
groups.description_zh: 3 月 14 日一個在愉景灣酒店「海濱白教堂」舉行的婚宴，出席人數超過 80 人，其後多名出席者先後確診。當中有確診婚宴賓客曾到蘭桂坊消遺。
groups.description_en: Numerous attendees - out of over 80 - were tested positive for coronavirus after having attended a wedding banquet at Auberge Discovery Bay on Mar 14.

node.location_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.remarks_zh: 3 月 20 日開始發燒，屬家居群組 - 個案 #237 ( 母親 ) 及 #304 ( 外祖父 )
node.remarks_en: Developed fever since Mar 20, she is part of home cluster - cases #237 (mother),  and #304 (grandfather)
